code: @Manual{,   title = {hnlcouncilR: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures},   author = {Bradley Rentz},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://rentzb.github.io/hnlcouncilR/}, }

what: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures
title: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures
text: hnlcouncilR package provides helper functions download data Honolulu City Council measures https://hnldoc.ehawaii.gov/hnldoc/measure export user friendly format. also currently contains one data visualization function creates network graph show city council members co-introduce measures together. features coming time. special request, feel free create issue requesting new features.

title: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures
text: can install development version hnlcouncilR GitHub :

title: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures
text: basic example use package
code: library(hnlcouncilR) # download data about measures measures_df <- get_council_measures(start_measure = 2796, end_measure = 3162) # extract more detailed information about the votes votes_df <- get_votes(measures_df) # visualize the co-introductions cointro_network_graph(measures_df, type = "all")

title: A package to download and analyze data about Honolulu City Council measures
text: package affiliated Honolulu City Council Government City County Honolulu.

Create Network Graph of Cointroductions of Honolulu City Council Measures — cointro_network_graph
text: measures_df measures tibble data frame created `get_council_measures` type type measure selection. Options "", "bill", "resolution".

title: Create Network Graph of Cointroductions of Honolulu City Council Measures — cointro_network_graph
text: igraph network plot

title: Create Network Graph of Cointroductions of Honolulu City Council Measures — cointro_network_graph
text: function creates network plot using igraph visualizes often Honolulu City Council members introduce measures together. line graph indicates one measure members introduced together. Honolulu City Council measures can introduced max two members, though many measures one introducer. Measures introduced one member shown graph.

title: Create Network Graph of Cointroductions of Honolulu City Council Measures — cointro_network_graph

what: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
title: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
text: `get_council_measures` returns data frame information measures occur within specified range measures.

title: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
text: start_measure numeric value starting measure. end_measure numeric value ending measure

title: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
text: tibble data frame information measure.

title: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures
text: function downloads information Honolulu City Council's website measures occur within range start_measure end_measure. values must numeric. single measure wanted, set start_measure end_measure value. numeric values measures differ measures' names. example, RES25-001 numeric value 3163, since number given url: https://hnldoc.ehawaii.gov/hnldoc/measure/3163. values appear occur sequential order, though occasional exceptions.

title: Download Information About Honolulu City Council Measures — get_council_measures

what: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
title: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
text: Extract Voting Results Honolulu City Council Measures

title: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
text: measures tibble data frame measures downloaded `get_council_measures`

title: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
text: tibble data frame long format one row per council member per voting event.

title: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
text: function creates long tibble data frame one row per voting event per Honolulu City Council member participated voting event. output function excludes non-voting events introduction measure publishing public hearing notices.

title: Extract Voting Results for Honolulu City Council Measures — get_votes
